thread.title: Author Mary Kubica coming to Gurnee
thread.title_full: Author Mary Kubica coming to Gurnee

author: Daily Herald report
title: Author Mary Kubica coming to Gurnee
text:
Gurnee's Warren-Newport Public Library District is taking reservations for those who want to meet author Mary Kubica at 2 p.m. Saturday, Nov. 14.
Kubica's latest novel "Pretty Baby" is a suspenseful story about a charitable woman who horrifies her family when she invites a homeless teenager and her infant to take refuge in their home.
The Nov. 14 event will include a discussion with Kubica. Register online at wnpl.info or call (847) 244-5150, extension 4. The library is at 224 N. O'Plaine Road.
 News Warren-Newport Public Library Literature
